task_description: Task to reset an online password

nice_to_have: Send a password reset link via email
Offer a chat support option during the reset process
Allow users to choose a password hint
deal_breakers: User does not remember the answers to security questions
Forgotten phone number linked for verification

decision_factors: User's familiarity with online security practices
Availability of recovery options (e.g., email, phone number)
Potential for account lockout after multiple failed attempts
Impact of password reset on linked accounts or services
Time sensitivity due to potential unauthorized access
